title: LearnIQ
description: An e-learning platform developed using MERN , focuses on improving learning experience for users.

title: Desktop Automation
description: This ongoing project allows voice-activated searches using Python, making information retrieval quick and intuitive.

title: TradeBud
description: This ongoing project provides traders with essential quantitative analysis tools, facilitating data-driven decision-making and strategy development for improved trading performance and market insight.

title: Sorting Visulaizer
description: Visualize sorting algorithms to easily understand and troubleshoot sorting issues.
